metadata.title: CVE-2019-5829 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in download manager in Google Chrome prior to 75.0.3770.80allowed a remote attacker to potentially perform out of bounds memoryaccess via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
